items.question: Does Mahershala Ali play the piano? What about when we see all of Mahershala's body, including his hands? He is absolutely mimicking the music we are hearing!
items.answer: The hands seen in the playing shots are those of the film's composer, Kris Bowers.

spoilerItems.question: Did they really make that call from jail to whom it says they did?
spoilerItems.answer: According to the Trivia section, yes, he did - on another trip, in 1963, but yes, he called Bobby Kennedy.

spoilerItems.question: Did Don really refuse to play the very last concert on the tour in Birmingham as depicted and if so, subsequently nobody got paid for the whole trip?
